name: §e§nShulker Qualities III
description: Being related to Shulkers, you have inherited some of their traits.

text: Similar to your Shulker cousins, you are about the size of a block. Fortunately, you have legs so you have more mobility than your cousins.
You are §e45%§r smaller and §e40%§r wider than a human.

You have the ability to teleport like Shulkers, teleporting to a nearby but safer location when in dangerous situations. Unfortunately because of this adaptation, you've lost the ability to use other teleportation items.
You cannot use Ender Pearls and Chorus Fruits.
While under §e50%§r health and taking damage, you have a §e30%§r chance to teleport once. This will set your teleport cooldown to §a15§r seconds.
If you are hit again after you teleported, you have a §e60%§r chance to teleport again. This will set your teleport cooldown to §a30§r seconds.
This passive is disabled when §d§nFortified Shell§r is active.
You can imitate the Shulker Bullets from the Shulkers through archery but because your hands are weirdly formed, you cannot effectively shoot a bow or crossbow.
Whenever you hit a target with an arrow, they will receive the §cLevitation§r effect for §c20§r seconds.
